newsitem.title: USA: PerSeptive says gets U.S. patent.
newsitem.headline: PerSeptive says gets U.S. patent.

text.p: PerSeptive Biosystems Inc said on Thursday the it had been issued a U.S. patent for its Perfusion Chromatography systems.

The patent broadens protection of the company's Perfusion Chromatography technology to include instruments and systems that perform its patented high-speed, high resolution chromatography, PerSeptive said.
